summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3921 for the improvement of the alley in block 14, plat of Columbia, being the alley between Hudson Street and Ferdinand Street, from 39th Avenue South to 42nd Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47741, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
